dc_title_s: Plan of the city intended for the permanent seat of the government of t[he] United States : projected agreeable to the direction of the President of the United States, in pursuance of an act of Congress passed the sixteenth day of July, MDCCXC, "establishing the permanent seat on the bank of the Potowmac" : [Washington D.C.]
dc_description_s: At upper right: Office, Commissioner of Public Buildings, D.C.  Lacks printer's statement.  Facsim. of ms. L'Enfant plan.  Includes texts containing letters dated "Washington ... 1887," notes, descriptive index of "References," and U.S.C. & G.S. insigne. Lacks text below "N.I."  At lower right: N.I.  In right upper margin: No. 3035a price 50 cents. Some copies have: ... 75 cents.|81 x 121 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:16,000|City Maps
dc_publisher_s: United States Coast and Geodetic Survey (Washington)
